title: About Me
text: My name is Charles Wojcik. I am currently pursuing an MS in Business Analytics at Baruch College’s Zicklin School of Business, with a focus in Data Analytics (Expected: May 2025).

title: About Me
text:
Professional Background
I bring a unique blend of experience spanning data analytics, media production, and military intelligence:

I currently work as a full-time day trader.
Previous experience includes televisionproduction work at The Problem with Jon Stewart and was a Page in NBCUniversal’s East Coast Page Program
Served as an Intelligence Specialist in the United States Marine Corps, where I deployed to Afghanistan twice

title: About Me
text:
Personal Interests
When I’m not working with data, you might find me: - At a New York Yankees game (proudly caught a home run ball in 2004!) - Cheering for the New York Jets as a season ticket holder - Recreating recipes from the Bon Appétit YouTube channel - Practicing mixology - Maintaining my daily journaling practice
